metadata.title: CVE-2024-39473 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:ASoC: SOF: ipc4-topology: Fix input format query of process modules withoutbase extensionIf a process module does not have base config extension then the sameformat applies to all of it's inputs and the process->base_config_ext isNULL, causing NULL dereference when specifically crafted topology andsequences used.

criterions.comment: linux package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
